entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, 2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 09:17 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022
Condition: Mist
Temperature: 2.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 2.6°C
Wind: SW 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature falling to minus 1 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle changing to 60 percent chance of rain showers this morning. Risk of freezing drizzle late this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 1 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022
